text: Mami Yamase (born October 2, 1969) is a Japanese singer, TV personality, and presenter. Born in Hiratsuka, Kanagawa Prefecture. Belongs to Horipro. Her husband is actor Masami Nakagami. She won the Grand Prix at the 10th Horipro Talent Scout Caravan, made her debut as a singer, and began working as an idol. After becoming a celebrity, she became active in variety shows as a variety idol, appearing in the TV show Shinkonsan Irasshai! In the 1990s, she also worked as an actress, appearing in numerous TV dramas and films. ==References==
title: Mami Yamase
